Transform.label: Camera Shake (Vector Motion Blur)
Transform.tooltip:
Another 2D Camera Shake Tool for Nuke Features vector motion blur; or 2d transform motion blur; combines vectors from an input with camera shake vectors for motion blur; presets
tiling; pre-transform paramaters; combining two noise patterns together; being able to view the output curves with time offsets to place 'bumps' at the right moment in time; seperate amplitude and frequency for Transform, scale and rotation
